item.title: Reading Nvidia SEC filings with SQL and Sentence Transformers - Part III
item.description: How to analyze Nvidia SEC filings - Part III Introduction This series of articles is made of three parts. In part I of this series we explored frequency word count for the most common words in Nvidia SEC filings. In part II we explored the most important sentences from the company’s SEC filings and we were overwhelmed by the number of them. In the final part III of this series, will try to reduce the number of sentences to a more manageable position by eliminating repeating sentences from previous years in order to streamline the analysis.

item.title: Reading Nvidia SEC filings with the help of Natural Language Processing - Part II
item.description: How to analyze Nvidia SEC filings - Part II Introduction This series of articles is made of three parts. In part I of this series we explored frequency word count for the most common words in Nvidia SEC filings. In this part, which is part II, we are going a step further, and try to explore the most important sentences from the company’s SEC filings. The last part III of the series will explore comparison of SEC filing statements across different time periods and elimination of repeating sentences in order to narrow down the research.
